Title: Establishes the category of "qualified group practice" for medical, dental and podiatric practices that comply with certain standards
Summary: Establishes the category of "qualified group practice" for medical, dental and podiatric practices that comply with certain standards and authorizes such practices to operate a malpractice prevention program.
LawCode: Add ยง2998-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to qualified group practices
